courses.title: PCB Fabrication For Everyone
courses.bio: PCB Fabrication For Everyone is packed with tips and tricks that will save you time and help you produce high-quality PC
requirements: A Computer or Laptop with any operating system
The Software that will be used to create the PCB Provided in the first Section (FREE)
courses.description:
Learn How to Manufacture Top Quality (PCB) Boards saving Time, Money, and Effort by PCBWay
Professional PCB fabrication has traditionally been only available to the largest of companies, but now it is finally possible for everyone. There are a number of start-ups that offer low-cost printed circuit board fabrication and assembly services for small electronics projects. These services can be used by prototypers, hobbyists, and professionals alike. If you are interested in this, then you are in the right place.
Welcome to this course. This course will help you to manufacture an industrial quality specialized PCB board which will help you to get started freelancing or to kickstart your project with a professional board. This will save you hours of hard work, a lot of money, and effort that you can invest elsewhere. You won't have to pay hundreds of dollars to get your PCB up and ready. I'll also teach you how to get your board assembled if you don't have time to solder components.
Printed Circuit Board design is very interesting for any electronics geek, microcontroller programmer, or anyone wishing to build their own PCB. This is a step-by-step guide that will be very simple and easy to understand for beginners.
No Previous Experience + Free Gerber Viewer + Time-Saving Techniques = Perfectly Manufactured PCB Board
This is available for you in this course plus bonuses and additional material.
Why You Should Take This Course:
Learn how to manufacture and process PCB boards with the help of professional software.
This course will show you how to design and manufacture your own PCB boards so you can save time, money, and effort.
The course includes detailed instructions on how to fabricate top-quality PCBs by using an affordable process that is not only effective but also easy.
The course is guaranteed to teach everything you need to know about PCB board fabrication so you can be successful in this industry.
This course is perfect to learn the basics and advanced techniques of PCB board manufacturing.
What You Can Take Advantage of After Finishing This Course:
PCB Prototyping and Manufacturing:
FR-4 and Aluminum boards, also advanced PCB like Rogers, HDI, Flexible and Rigid-Flex boards.
PCB Assembly:
SMT & THT assembly.
Layout and Design:
Partnering with quality service providers to offer design services.
Open-source Community:
Student sponsorship, shared PCB projects, and more.
Course Benefits:
PCB Quality Control: The design of your PCB is important, but it's also crucial to check the quality of your finished product. By receiving and checking your PCBs, you can ensure that they meet your standards and requirements. This quality control can save you time and money in the long run.
Design Your Own PCB: Receiving your own PCB can be thrilling. You spent hours designing it and making sure it was perfect. Now you get to see your design come to life. The best part is, you can now use it in your project. Quality is important when receiving your PCB, which is why our team at PCB Fabrication For Everyone takes great pride in providing quality products.
Quick and Easy PCB Design: Design your own PCBs with our easy-to-use online tool. You don't need any special skills or software, just a computer and an internet connection. We'll take care of the rest, from manufacturing to shipping.
What You Will Learn:
What are the best PCB manufacturing companies.
How to prepare your PCB design for manufacturing.
How to make an account on PCBWay.
Different settings provided by manufacturer companies for PCB production.
Placing your address the right way to get the PCB at your doorsteps.
Choose the right shipping method depending on your circumstances.
Track your PCB.
Receiving your PCB and checking quality.
Enroll Now!


About the Instructor Info
Educational Engineering Team
Team of skilled Engineers Sharing Knowledge with the World
Educational Engineering Team is a Leading Team in the Microcontroller Industry, with over 13 Years of Experience in Teaching and Doing Practical Projects.
We strive to put all our hands-on experience in these courses. Instead of superficial knowledge, we go into the depth of the topic and give you the exact, step-by-step blueprint on how to tackle simple as well as complex topics in easy and digestible bite-sized videos.
This real-world knowledge enables you to grasp knowledge easily, and you can apply this learning immediately to your life and projects.
Educational Engineering Team has been in the Programming and Microcontroller business since 2007. We have been part of many projects. Over the course of these years, we have gained a good insight into students’ and educators’ needs. We are passionate about sharing all our collective knowledge with you. As of 2018, we have already taught over 250k-THOUSAND students and counting.
Currently, we have more than 100+ Courses on Udemy.
Educator and Author of “Educational Engineering”
Ashraf is an educator, Mechatronics engineer, electronics and programming hobbyist, and Maker. He creates online video courses on the EduEng YouTube Channel (More Than 4 Million Views, 20k + Subscribers) and author of four Microcontroller books.
As a Chief Educational Engineer since 2007 at Educational Engineering Team, the company he founded, Ashraf’s mission is to explore new trends and technology and help educate the world and make it a better place.
Educational Engineering offers educational courses and Bootcamps, articles, lessons, and online support for electronics hobbyists, Programming hobbyists, Microcontroller hobbyists, STEM students, and STEM teachers.
The team also works as freelance engineers, helping many students in their graduation projects, and providing guidance and consulting for many students over the years to help them kick-start their careers.
Ashraf’s core skill is explaining difficult concepts in a step-by-step easy-to-understand manner using video and text. With over 11 years of tertiary teaching experience, Ashraf has developed a simple yet comprehensive and informative style in teaching that students from all around the world appreciate.
His passion for Microcontrollers and Programming, particularly for the world of Arduino, PIC Microcontroller, Raspberry Pi, has guided his personal development and his work through Educational Engineering.
Ashraf’s online courses have helped over 250,000 people from around the world to be better and to make a great career in the industry.
Educational Engineering Team offers Courses on:
Circuit Design, Simulation, and PCB Fabrication
Arduino, PIC Microcontroller, and Raspberry Pi
Programming in C, Python, and other programming languages
PLC Industrial Programming and Automation
3D Design and Simulation
ESP and IoT World

courses.title: VLSI-Low Power Design Techniques Part II
courses.bio: Have a knowledgeble low power design implementation techniques!
objectives: Low power in deep
Requirement to adopt low power techniques
Practical way of low power techniques
Able to get industry level of identification and implementing low power techniques
requirements: Low Power Design Part I course by ME (SRIRAM KRISHNA KAKARLA)
courses.description:
Low Power Design:
Low power design has become a critical aspect in modern electronics, especially with the increasing demand for portable and energy-efficient devices. From mobile phones to Internet of Things (IoT) devices, minimizing power consumption is essential to improve battery life, reduce thermal dissipation, and contribute to sustainability efforts. Low power design encompasses a variety of strategies, techniques, and innovations that address energy efficiency at different levels of system design, from architecture to individual components. This article will explore advanced topics in low power design, including techniques such as dynamic voltage and frequency scaling (DVFS), power gating, clock gating, and energy-efficient algorithms for multi-core processors, as well as the role of hardware accelerators and specialized architectures.
1. Dynamic Voltage and Frequency Scaling (DVFS)
Dynamic Voltage and Frequency Scaling (DVFS) is one of the most widely used techniques for reducing the power consumption of digital circuits. DVFS allows the system to dynamically adjust the voltage and frequency of processors and components based on workload demands. By lowering the supply voltage and frequency when the demand is low, significant power savings can be achieved.


2. Power Gating
Power gating is another advanced low power technique that involves turning off the power supply to sections of a circuit when they are not in use. This is achieved by using switches (such as transistors) to isolate parts of the chip from the power grid. Power gating helps to reduce static power consumption, particularly in technologies like CMOS where leakage currents are a significant contributor to power dissipation.


3. Clock Gating
Clock gating is an essential technique in low power design, especially for reducing dynamic power consumption. It works by selectively disabling the clock signal to portions of the circuit that are not in use. Since switching activity is responsible for a significant portion of dynamic power consumption, by preventing unnecessary toggling of circuit elements, the overall power consumption is significantly reduced.
4. Energy-Efficient Algorithms
Algorithmic-level optimizations also play a significant role in reducing power consumption. By designing energy-efficient algorithms, the overall workload for the hardware is minimized, leading to lower power usage. These algorithms are designed to take advantage of specific hardware features, such as low-power processors, specialized accelerators, or hardware accelerators for specific tasks like machine learning or signal processing.


5. Specialized Hardware Architectures and Accelerators
As applications become increasingly specialized, custom hardware accelerators tailored for specific tasks (e.g., AI, signal processing, or cryptography) are being widely adopted to improve energy efficiency. These accelerators are optimized for specific workloads and, compared to general-purpose CPUs, they offer much better performance-per-watt.


Low power design is a multifaceted area that involves a combination of hardware and software techniques to reduce energy consumption while maintaining performance. As power constraints become more critical, designers are increasingly relying on advanced methods such as DVFS, power gating, clock gating, energy-efficient algorithms, specialized hardware accelerators, and energy harvesting. By combining these techniques, it is possible to build energy-efficient systems that not only reduce power consumption but also enable new applications in fields like mobile computing, IoT, AI, and beyond. As the demand for low power devices continues to grow, the field of low power design will continue to evolve, incorporating new materials, architectures, and methodologies to address the challenges of power consumption in modern electronics.
target_audience: Fresher and upto senior engineer and any one in Semiconductor Engineer roles

objectives: creare circuiti stampati (PCB)

creare file gerber
requirements: È preferibile una formazione di base in elettronica.

courses.description:
Corso su KiCad: Progettazione di Circuiti Stampati
Descrizione: Il corso introduttivo su KiCad è progettato per fornire una guida completa per coloro che desiderano imparare a utilizzare KiCad per progettare circuiti stampati (PCB) in modo efficace e professionale. KiCad è un software open-source ampiamente utilizzato e apprezzato per la sua potenza, flessibilità e affidabilità nella progettazione di PCB.
KiCad
KiCad è una suite di software open-source per la progettazione di circuiti elettronici e la realizzazione di circuiti stampati (PCB). È composto da diversi strumenti che consentono agli utenti di creare schemi elettrici, disegnare il layout dei PCB, generare file di produzione per la fabbricazione dei PCB e molto altro ancora. KiCad è disponibile gratuitamente per diverse piattaforme, compresi Windows, macOS e Linux, ed è ampiamente utilizzato da studenti, professionisti e appassionati di elettronica in tutto il mondo.
Le principali componenti di KiCad includono:
Eeschema: Questo è l'editor di schemi elettrici di KiCad, che consente agli utenti di creare schemi elettrici per i loro progetti. Fornisce una vasta libreria di simboli e componenti e supporta funzionalità avanzate come schemi multi-pagina e simboli gerarchici.
Pcbnew: Questo è l'editor di layout PCB di KiCad, che consente agli utenti di disegnare il layout fisico dei loro PCB. Gli utenti possono posizionare i componenti, tracciare le piste di collegamento e gestire le regole di progettazione per garantire che il PCB soddisfi i requisiti tecnici e funzionali.
GerbView: Questo strumento consente agli utenti di visualizzare e controllare i file Gerber generati per la produzione dei PCB. I file Gerber rappresentano i vari strati del PCB, come strati di rame, maschere di saldatura e serigrafie, e sono utilizzati dalle fabbriche per la produzione dei PCB.
GerbView: Questo strumento consente agli utenti di visualizzare e controllare i file Gerber generati per la produzione dei PCB. I file Gerber rappresentano i vari strati del PCB, come strati di rame, maschere di saldatura e serigrafie, e sono utilizzati dalle fabbriche per la produzione dei PCB.
KiCad Project Manager: Questo strumento fornisce un'interfaccia utente per gestire i progetti KiCad. Gli utenti possono creare nuovi progetti, aprire progetti esistenti, gestire le risorse del progetto e generare file di produzione per la fabbricazione dei PCB.
Grazie alla sua natura open-source, KiCad è costantemente migliorato e aggiornato dalla comunità degli utenti e degli sviluppatori. È una potente e flessibile piattaforma che supporta una vasta gamma di funzionalità per la progettazione di circuiti elettronici e PCB, rendendola una scelta popolare per professionisti, studenti e hobbisti.


Cosa imparerai:
Fondamenti di progettazione di PCB e terminologia associata.
Installazione e configurazione di KiCad sul tuo sistema.
Interfaccia di KiCad e navigazione tra gli strumenti principali.
Creazione di schemi elettrici chiari e ben organizzati utilizzando simboli, connessioni e annotazioni.
Utilizzo di schemi multi-pagina e simboli gerarchici per progetti complessi.
Disegno del layout del PCB, posizionamento dei componenti e routing dei collegamenti.
Uso degli strumenti di verifica e controllo per garantire la correttezza del tuo progetto.
Generazione di file di produzione per la fabbricazione del PCB, inclusi i file Gerber e il file di posizionamento dei componenti (BOM).
Metodologia del Corso: Il corso è strutturato in lezioni pratiche che combinano spiegazioni teoriche con esempi pratici e esercizi guidati. Saranno forniti materiali di supporto, tutorial passo-passo e risorse aggiuntive per facilitare l'apprendimento e la comprensione.
Requisiti: Non sono richieste competenze pregresse in progettazione di PCB o esperienza con KiCad. Tuttavia, una conoscenza di base di elettronica e la familiarità con i concetti di circuiti stampati saranno utili.
Destinatari:
Studenti di ingegneria elettronica e informatica.
Professionisti dell'industria elettronica interessati ad approfondire le loro competenze di progettazione di PCB.
Appassionati di elettronica e hobbisti che desiderano imparare a progettare i propri PCB.
target_audience: Maker e inventori
progettisti elettronici
professionisti
imprenditori e startupper
inventori e hobbisty

objectives: Globant Enterprise AI is an enterprise platform designed to facilitate the implementation of artificial intelligence assistants adapted to different needs.
It is possible to create artificial intelligence assistants that can integrate and interact with operations, processes, systems and documents, thus increasing p

Organization management: API Tokens by Project and Organization

courses.description:
Presentation
Globant Enterprise AI (previously known as GeneXus Enterprise AI) is an enterprise platform designed to facilitate the implementation of artificial intelligence assistants adapted to different needs. It is possible to create artificial intelligence assistants that can integrate and interact with operations, processes, systems and documents, thus increasing productivity. This platform acts as a middleware, connecting enterprise applications with LLMs while providing a variety of tools and features to drive productivity and innovation.

Objective
Through examples we will teach you the concepts necessary to create and test different types of Artificial Intelligence Assistants, either from the platform's own backoffice, or through APIs using the Postman API Platform. As examples of use, we will teach you how to interact with these assistants from a GeneXus application.

Prerequisites
This course is designed for people with a technical profile (not necessarily GeneXus developers). Attendees must have basic knowledge of Prompt Engineering and the use of REST APIs and Postman to test the different APIs and integrate them into the developments.

Suggested methodology for the course
Watch each video and try to reproduce the examples developed there. To do this, you must have an authorized user to access Globant Enterprise AI.

Approximate duration: 9 hours (not just watching the videos)
target_audience: Desarrolladores

courses.description:
Bonjour !
Microsoft Intune gère en toute sécurité les identités, gère les applications et les appareils
Au fur et à mesure que les organisations prennent en charge les employés hybrides et distants, elles sont confrontées à la gestion des différents appareils qui accèdent aux ressources de l’organisation.
Les employés et les étudiants doivent collaborer, travailler à partir de n’importe où et accéder et se connecter de manière sécurisée à ces ressources. Les administrateurs doivent protéger les données de l’organisation, gérer l’accès des utilisateurs finaux et prendre en charge les utilisateurs où qu’ils travaillent.
Pour vous aider à relever ces défis et tâches, utilisez Microsoft Intune.
Microsoft Intune est une solution de gestion des points de terminaison basée sur le cloud. Il gère l’accès utilisateur et simplifie la gestion des applications & des appareils sur vos nombreux appareils, y compris les appareils mobiles, les ordinateurs de bureau et les points de terminaison virtuels.
Vous pouvez gérer les utilisateurs et les appareils, y compris les appareils appartenant à votre organisation et les appareils personnels. Microsoft Intune prend en charge les appareils clients Android, Android Open Source Project (AOSP), iOS/iPadOS, macOS et Windows
Intune simplifie la gestion des applications avec une expérience d’application intégrée, notamment le déploiement, les mises à jour et la suppression des applications
Intune automatise le déploiement de stratégies pour les applications, la sécurité, la configuration des appareils, la conformité, l’accès conditionnel, etc
Intune s’intègre aux services de défense contre les menaces mobiles, notamment Microsoft Defender pour point de terminaison et des services partenaires tiers
Avec Windows Autopilot, vous pouvez provisionner de nouveaux appareils et les envoyer directement aux utilisateurs à partir d’un fabricant OEM ou d’un fournisseur d’appareils. Pour les appareils existants, vous pouvez réinitialiser ces appareils pour utiliser Windows Autopilot et déployer la dernière version de Windows
Microsoft 365 pour les applications Office de productivité des utilisateurs finaux, notamment Outlook, Teams, Sharepoint, OneDrive, etc.
Dans cette formation,  je vais te former sur

Comment enroller vos devices
Enroller des mobiles Android et IOS (présentation)
Auto Pilot

courses.description:
O Arduino é uma plataforma muito popular atualmente. Criada inicialmente para facilitar a programação de microcontroladores, hoje é usada em diversas áreas tanto para prototipagem quanto para pesquisas.


Apesar de ter uma grande quantidade de bibliotecas, que facilitam em muito o desenvolvimento de projetos, os primeiros passos podem ser um poucos frustrantes se você não tiver habituado na programação em linguagem C/C++ ou programação de microcontroladores.


Esse curso foi criado para ajudar os iniciantes na plataforma Arduino a quebrarem as barreiras iniciais na plataforma.


O uso de uma plataforma de simulação gratuita lhe ajudará a entender os fundamentos essenciais da plataforma Arduino. Assim, quando você for usar a placa física e criar seus próprios projetos, já terá uma base sólida de conhecimento.


Outro ponto, é que você não precisa se preocupar em comprar materiais para iniciar o curso. Dessa forma pode ir comprando aos poucos para a construção dos seus projetos.


Caso você já tenha kits Arduino, poderá reproduzir os códigos criados durante o curso em sua placa física.


Aproveite o curso e use a plataforma da Udemy para tirar suas duvidas comigo quando precisar.


Te espero no curso!
target_audience: Qualquer pessoa que queira aprender a programar Arduino
Professores que precisam usar o Arduino em sala de aula
Iniciantes em programação
Alunos de cursos técnicos e/ou engenharias

courses.title: Primi passi con Arduino
courses.bio: Impara a creare e programmare semplici prototipi elettronici
objectives: Realizzare dispositivi interattivi con Arduino

Realizzare semplici circuiti elettronici su breadboard
Programmare Arduino (in C++)
requirements: Non servono particolari conoscenze elettroniche o di programmazione
courses.description:
In questo corso imparerai a utilizzare Arduino UNO per realizzare prototipi elettronici. Arduino nasce come piattaforma per realizzare prototipi elettronici. Arduino è utilizzato da designer, creatori, inventori e ingegneri per realizzare oggetti, robot, installazioni e meccanismi di ogni tipo: dalla stampante 3D alla macchina per il caffè. Potrete collegare ogni tipo di sensore, elaborare le informazioni e compiere ogni tipo di azione. Spesso questo tipo di realizzazioni sono definite Physical Coimputing.
Ogni progetto è sempre composto da un circuito elettronico e da un software. Imparerai a costruire circuiti e a scrivere il software di controllo.
Per costruire i circuiti non serve un saldatore ma useremo delle tavolette di prototipazione (breadboard), componneti e fili (jumper): sarà come giocare con i mattoncini Lego. Esistono anche dei kit speciali con cavetti e componenti già pronti all'uso. Se non hai un kit di Arduino, puoi comunque seguire il corso utilizzando il software gratuito (online) TinkerCAD circuits.
La scrittura del codice è fondamentale quanto la costruzione del circuito. Impareremo i comandi base e i rudimenti della programmazioni utilizzando Arduino IDE.
Tutte le lezioni avranno una parte teorica e una parte pratica in cui sperimentare e vi suggerirò esercizi ed esperimenti aggiuntivi.
Per seguire il corso non servono conoscenze di programmazione o di elettronica.
Io mi occupo di programmazione di microcontrollori, elettronica e software dal 2000. Ho lavorato come programmatore presso grandi multinazionali in vari settori. Dal 2012 mi sono messo in proprio e sviluppo hardware e prototipi di ogni tipo.
target_audience: Inventori, maker, artisti, startupper, designer e studenti che vogliono realizzare dispositivi elettronici interattivi

Aprender a fazer reparos na placa como: troca de conectores fpc, microfone smd, retirada de blindagens entre outros serviços

CURSO EM NÍVEL AVANÇADO COM CONTEÚDO ATUALIZADO E COM TÉCNICAS EXCLUSIVAS DE ENSINO.

courses.title: Universal Verification Methodology Overview
courses.bio: Maven Silicon
requirements: Any electronics/electrical engineering graduate with a good knowledge or experience in RTL design and verification using SystemVerilog testbenches.
courses.description:
This UVM foundation course provides a comprehensive introduction to the Universal Verification Methodology (UVM), making it ideal for beginners and engineers looking to strengthen their functional verification skills. The course begins with a solid overview of UVM concepts, including UVM agents, UVCs (Universal Verification Components), and testbench architecture. These topics are explained through practical, real-world examples such as AHB UVCs and SoC-level UVM testbenches, allowing learners to understand how UVM is applied in actual projects.
The course emphasizes the importance and necessity of using UVM in today’s complex verification environments. It demonstrates how UVM helps manage large-scale verification projects, particularly at the IP and SoC levels. Through structured lessons and example-driven learning, students gain a strong foundation in building reusable, scalable, and maintainable verification environments using SystemVerilog and UVM principles.
In addition to theoretical understanding, the course offers hands-on experience and real design scenarios to ensure that learners can apply the concepts effectively. Whether you're new to UVM or looking to reinforce your basics, this course will help you grasp the nuts and bolts of UVM and lay the groundwork to become a skilled verification engineer. By the end, you’ll be ready to take on advanced UVM challenges with confidence and clarity.
target_audience: Any under/post graduate who has electronics engineering background.
Graduates who are doing any engineering course related to electronics, EEE, ECE, VLSI, Nanotechnology, Micro Electronics, Instrumentation, CSE
Working Professionals who wants to up skill their knowledge in VLSI Verification

courses.title: Resume Essentials for VLSI Internships and Entry-Level Jobs
courses.bio: Step by Step Guide from Scratch
requirements: Basic working experience with web browser
courses.description:
In the rapidly evolving landscape of Very Large Scale Integration (VLSI) design, a compelling resume can be your ticket to unlocking exciting career opportunities. The 'Crafting a Strong VLSI Engineer Resume for VLSI Roles' course is meticulously crafted to equip aspiring VLSI professionals with the essential skills and strategies needed to build a standout resume that grabs the attention of recruiters and hiring managers in the semiconductor industry. This comprehensive course delves into the fundamental principles of resume writing, tailored specifically to the intricacies of the VLSI domain. Participants will embark on a journey that demystifies the process of resume creation, guiding them through each crucial step with clarity and precision. Throughout the course, participants will gain insights into the unique requirements and preferences of VLSI recruiters, understanding what sets apart an exceptional resume from the crowd. From structuring content to highlighting key achievements, every aspect of resume development will be thoroughly explored, ensuring that participants acquire the necessary tools to showcase their skills and experiences effectively.
Key topics covered in the course include:
a. Identifying key details: Understanding which information is crucial to include in a resume to demonstrate suitability for VLSI roles.
b. Structuring pertinent information: Learning how to organize relevant details in a clear and concise manner to make a strong impression on potential employers.
c. Employing impactful presentation methods: Exploring various formatting and design strategies to enhance the visual appeal and readability of the resume.
d. Tailoring content based on job requirements: Understanding how to customize the resume to align with specific job roles and industry expectations in the VLSI field.
e. Adhering to word constraints: Learning techniques for condensing information while retaining its significance to meet word limitations, especially in the context of resume scoring.
target_audience: Recent Grads /Post-Grads seeking entry-level positions or internships in the VLSI industry.
Individuals who are actively seeking employment and want to enhance their resume.
Individuals from non-engineering backgrounds interested in VLSI and need to tailor their resumes.

courses.title: Aprende electrónica básica desde cero
courses.bio: Comprende la base fundamental de los circuitos electrónicos y verifica el funcionamiento por medio de simulaciones
objectives: Comprenderá el concepto de notación científica y de ingeniería.
Comprenderá conceptos asociados a la potenciación y su relación con operaciones como la suma, resta, multiplicación y división.
Comprenderá el concepto del circuito eléctrico, corriente, voltaje y potencia eléctrica, y su debida relación por medio de la ley de ohm.
Comprenderá y solucionará problemas relacionados con circuitos resistivos en serie, paralelos y mixtos.
Comprenderá y solucionará problemas relacionados con circuitos resistivos en serie, paralelos y mixtos por medio de las leyes de Kirchhoff (análisis nodal y de mallas).

Entendiendo la potenciación: Que son las potencias?, y sus propiedades.
Multiplicación y división de potencias y su relación con números decimales.
Entendiendo la notación científica y de: Qué es la notación de ingeniería?
Entendiendo los circuitos electricos: Qué es el circuito eléctrico?, y su relación con la corriente y el voltaje.
Qué es la resistencia eléctrica?, relación entre potencia y ley de ohm.
Entendiendo las leyes de Kirchhoff: Introducción a las leyes de Kirchhoff, y cuál es la ley de voltaje (LVK)?
Cuál es la ley de corriente de Kirchhoff (LCK)?, y algunos ejemplos de LVK y LCK
Análisis de circuitos resistivos por las: Introducción y solución de circuitos por el método de nodos
Solución de circuitos por el método de mallas y comparaciones

requirements: Interés y motivación por el aprendizaje de la electricidad y electrónica.
Computador con acceso a internet
courses.description:
El curso Aprende electrónica básica desde cero esta enfocado para todo tipo estudiantes, en especial para aquellos Geeks apasionados por la tecnología que deseen iniciar en el mundo de la electricidad y electrónica, el curso consta de una serie de video lecturas que te irán adentrando en los conceptos más fundamentales, estas video lecturas están acompañadas de la explicación de  ejercicios paso a paso en conjunto con sus correspondientes cálculos matemáticos, y como si fuera poco, en el curso también se introduce el tema de simulación de circuitos, el cual te permitirá verificar que todo lo que calculaste y solucionaste en la teoría también funciona muy bien en la practica.
Este curso pretende abarcar todo el espectro inicial del aprendizaje entorno a circuitos resistivos, es decir que el curso esta estructurado bajo las siguiente unidades temáticas:
¿Qué son las potencias y sus propiedades?
Multiplicación y división entre potencias y su relación con los números decimales.
¿Qué es la notación científica y de ingeniería?
¿Qué es un circuito eléctrico, y su relación con la corriente, voltaje, potencia y la ley de ohm?
¿Cómo se analiza un circuito resistivo en serie, paralelo y mixto?
¿Qué son las leyes de Kirchhoff y cuales son estas (LVK) y (LCK)?
¿Cómo analizar circuitos resistivos por medio del análisis nodal y de mallas, aplicando las leyes de Kirchhoff?


Son 13 apasionantes clases que suma alrededor de 4 horas de conocimiento de calidad especialmente diseñado para ti que eres un amante de la tecnología.
target_audience: Estudiantes de colegios y preparatorias.
Estudiantes en inicios de carreras técnicas y tecnológicas con afines a ingenierías
Tecnólogos entusiastas.
Aficionados a la tecnología.

courses.title: A'dan Z'ye Arduino Dersleri ve Robotik Kodlama Projeleri
courses.bio: Arduino dersleri ile robotik kodlama konuları projeler üzerinden anlatılıyor. | Arduino Dersleri | Robotik Kodlama |
objectives: Programlama Temelleri
Temel Elektronik ve Ölçme
Elektronik Devre Çizim Uygulamaları
Arduino Kartları ve Kullanımı
Sensörler, Ekranlar ve Motorlar ile Çalışma
Kablosuz Haberleşme Yöntemleri
Bilgisayar ve Cep Telefonu Kontrollü Uygulamalar
Nesnelerin İnterneti
requirements: Giriş seviyesi bir bilgisayara sahip olmanız yeterlidir.
Hiçbir elektronik bileşene sahip olmasanız dahi elektronik devre çizim ve simülasyon uygulamaları ile eğitimi tamamlayabilir, örnek uygulama ve projeleri gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
Uygulamaları fiziksel ortamda yapmak için Arduino Uno kartı ve diğer elektronik bileşenleri içeren bir sete sahip olmanız faydalı olacaktır.
courses.description:
Lise yıllarında kodlama öğrenmeye başladım. Üniversite eğitimimden sonra 2008 yılından bu yana aktif olarak Programlama ve Robotik Kodlama üzerine çalışmalar yapmaktayım.
Programlama Temelleri, Temel Elektronik ve Ölçme ve Robotik Kodlama konularını içeren bu kurs sayesinde, mesleki bilgi ve becerilerimi sizlerle paylaşacağım.
Bu süreçte programlama ve robotik kodlama ile ilgili sorularınıza hızlı yanıtlar vererek sizlere destek olacağım.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Arduino Setleri ve Robotik Kodlama ile ilgili tüm ihtiyaçlarınızı Robotistan üzerinden SKYUDEMY kodu ile avantajlı alabilirsiniz.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Programlama ve robotik kodlama öğrenmek istiyor ancak nereden başlayacağınıza karar veremiyorsanız bu kursu gönül rahatlığı ile tercih edebilirsiniz.
Bu kurs daha önceden programlama ve elektronik konusunda deneyimi ve ön bilgisi olmayanlar düşünülerek hazırlandı. Dolayısı ile konular sıfırdan ileriye doğru düzenli bir şekilde anlatıldı. Öğrendiklerimizi pekiştirmemizi sağlayacak uygulamalı projeler ile kurs içeriği zenginleştirildi.
Ayrıca bu kurs daha önceden öğrendiğiniz kodlama ve elektronik bilgilerinizi tazeleyerek, öğrendiklerinize yenilerini ekleyebilirsiniz.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Kurs Puanlaması ve Yorumlar
A'dan Z'ye Arduino Dersleri ve Robotik Kodlama Projeleri kursu yayınlandığı günden bu yana 4.84 ile 4.95 ortalama puan aralığına sahiptir. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlara göz atabilir ve beklentileriniz ile kurs içeriğini karşılaştırabilirsiniz.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Arduino kartı, Arduino seti veya elektronik malzemem yok diye robotik kodlama öğrenmekten vazgeçmeyiniz.
Kurs içeriğindeki anlatılan konular ve geliştirilen projeler hem simülasyon hem de fiziksel ortamda anlatıldı. Dolayısı ile Arduino kartı ve bileşenlerine sahip olmasanız dahi kurs konularını ve uygulamaları simülasyon uygulamaları ile gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
target_audience: Programlama ve robotik kodlama öğrenmek isteyen her yaştan bireyleri
Mekatronik Mühendisliği öğrencilerini
Bilgisayar Mühendisliği, Elektrik-Elektronik Mühendisliği öğrencilerini
Ortaokul, Lise ve Ön Lisans öğrencilerini
Son olarak beşikten mezara kadar öğrenme felsefesini benimseyen, eğitime ve öğrenmeye değer veren herkesi kursuma kayıt olmaya bekliyorum.

courses.title: Ensamblaje de PC: ¡Arma tu Primer Computador Fácil y Rápido!
courses.bio: Conoce el hardware del armado de una computadora y aprende a ensamblar la tuya propia desde cero
objectives: Armar un computador desde cero por ti mismo
Conocer las partes que conforman una PC
Reemplazar los componentes que requieras de cualquier computador
Saber cómo funciona una PC
Identificar las diferentes conexiones y puertos existentes en un computador

Módulo Adicional - Instalando Windows: Hagamos un Medio de Instalación de Windows 7
Configuremos el Arranque en la BIOS

requirements: Debes contar con los componentes o Hardware descritos para el armado
Destornilladores de diferentes tamaños
courses.description:
¿Has usado alguna vez una computadora?
¿Te parece una herramienta esencial en el día a día
¿Te has llegado a preguntar cómo son por dentro?
¿En algún momento te has sentido interesado en armar una por ti mismo?
Si tus respuestas han sido afirmativas, ¡Felicidades! Estás en el lugar correcto y en el curso indicado para ti.


Mi nombre es Angel, y en este curso te guiaré paso a paso en el armado de cada componente que conforma un computador a día de hoy hasta tener una PC lista para hacerla funcionar.


En este curso aprenderás cómo se conecta cada componente del hardware entre sí y te entregaré las herramientas necesarias para su ejecución. Además, adquirirás las habilidades y el conocimiento requerido para su ensamblaje y al finalizar la última lección habrás terminado con un nuevo PC totalmente armado por ti.
Al mismo tiempo, esto te servirá para reemplazar en cualquier momento algún componente defectuoso que se haya dañado o simplemente cuando quieras actualizar otro por hardware más moderno o potente, sin tener que llevar el computador al servicio técnico. Haciéndolo tú mismo, te ahorrarás mucho dinero y tiempo que puedes aprovechar de otra manera.



Para ello, dividí el curso en tres partes:
1. Te hablaré rápidamente de los componentes que conforman todo computador en su nivel más básico y para qué sirve cada uno de ellos.
2. Te mostraré específicamente con los que vamos a trabajar para armar este PC.
3. Haremos juntos el ensamblaje pieza por pieza de nuestro pequeño proyecto.


Armar un computador es divertido y fácil. Así que, atrévete y ¡comienza a armar un PC para ti, para algún familiar o para algún amigo!
target_audience: A todo aquel que sienta interés por los computadores y quiera aprender a armar uno como proyecto propio o para familiares y/o amigos
A quien no quiera comprar un PC pre-ensamblado en una tienda

courses.title: KiCad ile PCB Kart Tasarımları | 6 Board
courses.bio: Bu kurs ile KiCad programını kullanarak kendi kartlarınızı tasarlayabileceksiniz.
objectives: Kendi PCB kartlarını tasarlayabilecek ve PCB kart tasarımının mantığını öğrenebilecekler.

ESP32 SHIELD TASARIMI (GÜNCEL EKLENEN): PCB Yol Bağlantıları ve Şematik Güncelleme İşlemleri

requirements: Temel elektronik bilgisi gereklidir.
courses.description:
Kursumuz program kurulumu ile başlamaktadır. Temel elektronik devreler ile PCB kartlarımızı tasarlıyoruz.Bu tasarım şemaları ile KiCad programını kullanarak, istediğimiz boyutta kart dizayn edilebililiyoruz.
KiCad programı ücretsiz bir program olarak bizlere sunulmuştur. Kolay ve anlaşılır arayüzü sayesinde tasarımcıları kullanım konusunda rahatlatmaktadır.
Kursumuzu izleyerek yeni bir program öğrenebilir, kişisel gelişiminize katkıda bulunabilirsiniz.
Hazır projelerden sıkıldıysanız, kendi PCB kartınızı tasarlamak istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre!


KiCad Hakkında
KiCad, Elektronik Tasarım Otomasyonu (EDA) için açık kaynaklı bir yazılım paketidir. Programlar, Gerber çıktısı ile Şematik Yakalama ve PCB Düzenini işler. Paket, Windows, Linux ve macOS üzerinde çalışır ve GNU GPL v3 altında lisanslanmıştır.
Tarih
KiCad ilk olarak 1992 yılında orijinal yazarı Jean-Pierre Charras tarafından yayınlandı. O zamandan beri sürekli geliştirilmektedir ve şu anda KiCad Geliştirme Ekibi tarafından yönetilmektedir.
KiCad adı, Jean-Pierre Charras'ın arkadaşı "Ki"nin bir şirketin baş harflerinin "Cad" ile birleştirilmesinden gelmektedir. Ama artık yazılım paketinin adı olmaktan başka bir anlamı yok. Jean-Pierre tarafından bir e-postada bahsedilmiştir.
Daha fazla KiCad geçmişi, genel bilgiler ve gelişmeler Wayne'in 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020 ve 2021 FOSDEM sunumlarında bulunabilir.
KiCad, baskı devre kartları ve elektronik devre şema tasarımı için açık kaynak EDA programıdır. KiCad, Jean-Pierre Charras tarafında geliştirilmiştir.(Kaynak:Wikipedia)
Proje Yönetimi
KiCad projesi, lider geliştirme ekibinin üyelerinden oluşan bir teknik komite tarafından yönetilir. Kararların çoğu teknik komitenin oy birliği ile alınır. Bir fikir birliğine varılamadığında, nihai karar proje lideri tarafından verilir.
target_audience: Mühendislik öğrencileri , öğretmenler ve kendi kartını tasarlamak isteyen herkes.

courses.title: 【PLCのシーケンス制御プログラム】すぐに使えるワードステップシーケンス
courses.bio: 読みやすいラダープログラムをつくる
objectives: PLCのラダープログラムを使った制御装置の設計方法を学ぶ
シーケンス制御の読みやすいラダープログラムの作り方を学ぶ
テストをしやすくする技術を身につける
AiやIoTにつながるデータ思考のPLC技術を身につける
数字で進行するステップシーケンスの型を身につける
はじめての方でも読みやすいプログラムのつくり方を身につける
プログラム事例で実践しながら身につける
プログラムをつくる前準備からアウトプットのテストまでを学ぶ
プログラムをつくる「型」をテンプレートで学ぶ
requirements: プログラミングのソフトウェアは三菱電機のGX-Works2を使います
未経験の方は、GX-Works2の体験版を使って学びます
PCまたはスマホで講義を視聴することができます
courses.description: 「機械を思うがままに動かせるようになる！」「モノを動かすってこんなに面白いんだ」「こんなにラダープログラムが読みやすくなるんだ！」わからなかったPLCプログラミングがサクサクつくれる！これからのDX時代に役立つ【データ思考の問題解決力】も身に付く！ラダー言語のままでだからすぐに実践で使いながら学べます！
target_audience: PLCプログラミングがうまくいかない！という方
AIやIoT対応などPLCのデータ思考に関心を持つ方
ラダープログラムのトラブルに悩みのある方
ラダープログラムのステップシーケンスに興味がある方

courses.title: Robótica con Arduino. Nuevo Curso Completo
courses.bio: Aprende a programar y a hacer tus primeros robots en este curso completo de Arduino.
objectives: Conceptos básicos de programación en Arduino
Circuitos y conceptos básicos de cómo funciona la electricidad
Primeros robots con la placa Arduino y sus sensores
La matemática cómo herramienta para que funcionen nuestros Robots
Creatividad para resolver problemas de la vida cotidiana con la robótica
requirements: No se necesita experiencia en programación.
Se necesita un kit de robótica con la placa Arduino y sus sensores, se puede conseguir en cualquier store de electrónica. Se recomienda el kit de "Elegoo - Proyecto Uno"
Conceptos básicos sobre matemática.
Un ordenador / computadora personal con salida USB.
courses.description:
Hola, soy el profe Lucho. En este curso aprenderemos todos los fundamentos básicos que hacen a la robótica. ¿Se imaginan conectando un motor a una ventana para que se abra de forma automática cuando hace calor? Bueno, en este curso aprenderemos las herramientas necesarias para construir nuestros primeros proyectos. Para esto necesitamos aprender sobre programación, circuitos y electricidad, los sensores que vamos a utilizar y cómo pensar nuestros proyectos de forma creativa para luego llevarlos a la vida real.
Este curso está pensado para gente que nunca programó o creó un robot. Iremos clase tras clase adquiriendo conocimientos y construyendo a partir de la clase anterior, para terminar armando proyectos muy poderosos.
También hablaremos un poco sobre el uso de la impresión 3D cómo herramienta de prototipado, ya que es uso común combinar la robótica con la impresión 3D. Si bien no es una clase de impresión 3D, explicaremos en qué consiste.
Para poder seguir este curso, será necesario un Kit que contenga todos los componentes de róbotica incluyendo la placa Arduino. Este kit lo pueden conseguir en cualquier casa de electrónica o mismo a través de Amazon o MercadoLibre. Se recomienda el Kit de la marca "Elegoo - Proyecto Uno" que contiene todos los sensores que vamos a utilizar.
También se puede seguir el curso con la versión digital de los componentes con el programa Tinkercad. Si bien es posible, siempre es más divertido y didáctico utilizar los componentes físicos, ya que podemos tocar y experimentar con los circuitos que iremos armando.
target_audience: Alumnos que quieren dar sus primeros pasos en la programación. La robótica es una forma divertida para aprender y ver qué hace nuestro código.
Aquellos que quieran crear un robot que haga tareas divertidas
Adolescente / adultos que manejen conceptos básicos de matemáticas.

courses.title: Electronic Components: Beginner Guide
courses.bio: This course will give you everything you need to start playing with electronics components and fix electronic devices

Basics: Understanding Types of Current and Circuits
Introduction to DMM: Practical: Introduction to Digital Multi-meter DMM
Voltage: Taking Measurements: Practical: How to Measure DC Voltage
Circuit Diagram Basics: Circuit Diagram Basics and Basic Symbols
Resistors: Introduction To Resistor and Color Band Coding
Capacitors: Practical 1: How to test a capacitor
Diodes: Practical 1: How to test a Diode
Practical 2: How to test a Diode

requirements: A multimeter
A breadboard
jumper wires
battery
Resistors
capacitors
LEDs
diodes
transistors
voltage regulators
courses.description:
This Electronic Components course is intended for those interested in learning electronics.
The course introduces the students to the concept of electronic components, their uses, and how they work within an electrical system. The electronics industry has been skyrocketing over the last few years as more and more people are using electrical appliances for their everyday needs. It is so important to know the basics of how these components work, as they are a necessity in modern society. Here is a step-by-step guide to help you understand what electronic components are, what they do, and how they function.
Electronic components are the building blocks of any electronic device and they come in a wide range of sizes and shapes. These videos will walk you through some basic information about electronics so you know how to identify and use these building blocks. Practical examples are also added.
Welcome to this Course
Topics that will be discussed during the Introduction to Electronic Components Course are listed here in a brief outline:
The Components of Electricity
Volt-Ohm-Meter Basics (Measuring Electricity)
Circuit Diagrams Basics (Electronic Roadmaps)
The Resistor
Ohm’s Law
The Capacitor
The Inductor
The Diode
The Transistor (Electronic Valves)
Why You Should Take This Course:
You will learn how to read circuit diagrams.
You will learn how to solder.
You will learn how to identify parts on an electronic schematic diagram.
You will become familiar with the most commonly used electronic components.
This course will give you everything you need to start playing with electronic components and fix electronic devices.
It is designed so that you can quickly get started without having to spend months of your time learning lots of irrelevant information.
It will cover all of the basics, so even if you never plan on getting any further than this one course, you'll still learn more than enough.
You will learn how to take care of the small components that are inside your electronics.
Things You Should Know Before We Start:
The topics up to and including Ohm’s Law are what we will start with. The remaining topics cover additional fundamental components of basic electronics. The course will be in platform discussion, guide practices, and open question format as the material dictates. The course uses a standardized volt-ohm-meter (VOM) for illustration.
Quick Summary of Things That We Will Discuss Through This Course:
In this Introduction to Electronic Components Course, we will begin by discussing the three components that make up electricity. Next, we will spend more extensive time on how to measure the three components of electricity. During this section, we will explore two of the three components (voltage and current).
This section will cover VOM basics and allow you to become familiar with the most important and basic piece of test equipment. In the next section, the Circuit Diagrams section, you will learn how to use electronic components symbols on an electronic road map called a schematic or circuit diagram.
Many of the symbols will represent new concepts for many of you and these concepts will be fully developed once we finish the section. As a result, you will develop the fundamentals of interpreting circuit diagrams so that these illustrations of the arrangement of electronic components can help you with the remainder of the course.
The final of the three components, resistors, will be covered next. How the three components are related mathematically is Ohm’s Law and this fundamental law will be covered in detail. These sections make up the basic, basic material of electronics.
Four additional components common to virtually all electronic circuits are the capacitor, inductor, diode, and transistor. I will cover these topics with a level of detail that will familiarize the audience with the function of these components and the basics of how they work and react in different situations.
There are text reading assignments for each section of the course.
Enroll in this course now and learn more about electronic components!
What You Will Learn:
Basics of electricity and measuring electrical components.
How to read and interpret circuit diagrams.
Identification and function of common electronic components.
Practical soldering techniques.
How to troubleshoot and fix electronic devices.
Who Is This Course For:
Beginners in electronics.
Individuals interested in learning about electronic components.
Hobbyists and enthusiasts looking to expand their knowledge.
Requirements:
Basic computer skills.
No prior knowledge of electronics required.


About the Instructor Info
Educational Engineering Team
Team of skilled Engineers Sharing Knowledge with the World
Educational Engineering Team is a Leading Team in the Microcontroller Industry, with over 13 Years of Experience in Teaching and Doing Practical Projects.
We strive to put all our hands-on experience in these courses. Instead of superficial knowledge, we go into the depth of the topic and give you the exact, step-by-step blueprint on how to tackle simple as well as complex topics in easy and digestible bite-sized videos.
This real-world knowledge enables you to grasp knowledge easily, and you can apply this learning immediately to your life and projects.
Educational Engineering Team has been in the Programming and Microcontroller business since 2007. We have been part of many projects. Over the course of these years, we have gained a good insight into students’ and educators’ needs. We are passionate about sharing all our collective knowledge with you. As of 2018, we have already taught over 250k-THOUSAND students and counting.
Currently, we have more than 100+ Courses on Udemy.
Educator and Author of “Educational Engineering”
Ashraf is an educator, Mechatronics engineer, electronics and programming hobbyist, and Maker. He creates online video courses on the EduEng YouTube Channel (More Than 4 Million Views, 20k + Subscribers) and author of four Microcontroller books.
As a Chief Educational Engineer since 2007 at Educational Engineering Team, the company he founded, Ashraf’s mission is to explore new trends and technology and help educate the world and make it a better place.
Educational Engineering offers educational courses and Bootcamps, articles, lessons, and online support for electronics hobbyists, Programming hobbyists, Microcontroller hobbyists, STEM students, and STEM teachers.
The team also works as freelance engineers, helping many students in their graduation projects, and providing guidance and consulting for many students over the years to help them kick-start their careers.
Ashraf’s core skill is explaining difficult concepts in a step-by-step easy-to-understand manner using video and text. With over 11 years of tertiary teaching experience, Ashraf has developed a simple yet comprehensive and informative style in teaching that students from all around the world appreciate.
His passion for Microcontrollers and Programming, particularly for the world of Arduino, PIC Microcontroller, Raspberry Pi, has guided his personal development and his work through Educational Engineering.
Ashraf’s online courses have helped over 250,000 people from around the world to be better and to make a great career in the industry.

Arduino, PIC Microcontroller, and Raspberry Pi

requirements: Temel Elektrik Bilgisi, Biraz İnternet Bilgisi, Öğrenme İsteği, Kod Yazma İsteği
courses.description:
BU EĞİTİM İLE  DONANIM VE YAZILIM TARAFI OLAN ÜRÜNÜNÜZÜ YAPABİLİRSİNİZ. BURADA ÖĞRENDİĞİNİZ BİLGİLER İLE YENİ BİR İŞ İMKANI VEYA SAHASI ORTAYA ÇIKABİLİR. ÇOK UCUZA EV-İŞ OTOMASYONU YAPILABİLİR. TAMAMEN AÇIK KAYNAK YAPI.
Özet Açıklama : Elektrikli bir cihazı Arduino,Php,Html,MySQL ile uzaktan kapatıp açabilme eğitimi. Temel olarak nesnelerin internet veya iç ağ üzerinden bir üye giriş paneli ile nasıl bağlantı sağlayacağı, arduino uno kartına bağlı röle ile daha fazla güç gereken ürünün IOT mantığıyla açılıp kapatılması anlatılmıştır. Web arayüz bölümü HTML,PHP,MYSQL teknolojileri ile gerçekleştirilmiştir. Arduino bölümünde ise mysql connector kütüphanesinde bulunan query result dosyasına bazı eklemeler yaparak veritabanı seçme özelliği eklenmiştir. Edinilen bilgiler ile çok ucuza ev,iş,bina otomasyonu yapılabilir.
Detaylı Açıklama : Bu eğitim ile Arduino, PHP, HTML, MySQL, Gömülü Sistemler, IOT | Nesnelerin interneti temel olarak anlatılıp gerçek bir proje prototipi yapılacaktır.
Nesnelerin interneti mantığıyla dünyanın her yerinden elektrikli cihazların  web paneli ile
• Arduino kartını kullanarak kişisel ev,iş veya bina otomasyonunun nasıl yapıldığı,
• Ayrıca arduinonun internete veya yazılıma erişemediği durumlarda nasıl davranacağı ilgili kontağın otomatik olarak kapatılmasının nasıl sağlandığı,
• Kartın Eeprom unu kullanarak elektrik kesilse dahi ilgili kontağın hafızasının nasıl kesilmediği,
• Şifreli giriş ekranı ile kontrol panelinin nasıl hazırlandığı,
• Kodlardan tasarım ve geliştirme kartına  komponentlerin eklenmesi, host edilmesine kadar tek tek anlatılacaktır.
• Uzaktan kontrol edilebilecek cihazlar buzdolabı, klima, lamba, kepenk sistemleri, yemleme makinası,priz,kontak,sulama vs ürünler
• Arduino ile veritabanına erişimi ve iletişimi anlatılmıştır. Arduino birden çok veritabanı olan sunucuda ilgili veritabanını nasıl seçtiği gösterilmiştir. Arduino için kullanılan veritabanı Mysql dir.
• Arduino kartı üzerinden veritabanına (mysql'e) insert,update,delete,select işlemlerinin nasıl yapıldığı dht11 üzerinden alınan sıcaklık ve nem bilgisinin veritabanına kaydedilmeside anlatılmıştır.
Kursu aldıktan sonra soru cevap bölümünden tarafıma soru sorabilirsiniz. En kısa sürede soruları cevaplamaya çalışacağım.
Anahtar Kelimeler : arduino mysql bağlantısı, arduino ile mysql, arduino mysql, arduino ethernet, arduino veritabanı veri çekme, arduino php, arduino sql bağlantısı, arduino ile mysql bağlantısı, arduino ile phpmyadmin, arduino ile veritabanı bağlantısı, arduino ile sql, arduino ile mysql, internet üzerinden arduino ya erişim (arduinonun internet üzerinden bilgi alması), internet üzerinden arduino kontrolü (internet üzerinden arduinonun bilgi alması), internet üzerinden lamba aç,kapat,açma kapatma, uzaktan lamba kontrolü, uzaktan lamba açma kapama, dijital uzaktan kumanda kontrol sistemi, internet üzerinden elektrik kontrolü, uzaktan kumanda led kontrol, uzaktan kumandalı lamba duyu, uzaktan bahçe sulama
NOT : Prototipte anlatılan röle ile en fazla 25 Ampere kadar (Anma Akımı) ürün çalıştırılabilir. (daha yüksek akım gerektiren uygulamalar için başka model röle kullanınız.) Prototipte anlatılan 2.5mm2 kablo ile en fazla 20 Ampere kadar akım taşıyabilir.  (daha yüksek akım gerektiren uygulamalar için başka kalınlıkta kablo kullanınız.)
target_audience: Öğrenmeye meraklı soran araştıran, Yeni teknolojilere açık.
Birden fazla teknolojiyi birlikte kullanabilen.

courses.title: Aprende a minar Bitcoin paso a paso desde cero
courses.bio: Minería especializada en Bitcoin
objectives: Aprenderán a minar la criptomoneda Bitcoin desde cero
Gestionar sus criptocarteras y generar ganancias de la conversión a moneda fiat
Uso de maquinas de minería ASIC, instalación y mantenimiento.

Instalación y requisitos de las máquinas: Instalación y requisitos de las máquinas ASIC
Conectando cables ethernet y creación de: Conectando cables ethernet y creación de criptocartera

requirements: Un smartphone y una pc o laptop
Paciencia y atención.
courses.description:
En este curso, aprenderás los conceptos básicos que rodean el mundo de la minería, como las criptomonedas, criptocarteras, Bitcoin, maquinas ASIC, aplicaciones de gestión de minería, pools de minería, plataformas de criptocarteras, entre otros. Todo esto, para entender que la forma más eficiente y rentable de minar el Bitcoin, no es mediante minados mágicos en la nube, o desde el celular, si no, mediante las maquinas de minería, que a diferencia de los tan populares rigs de minería basados en tarjetas gráficas, tienen mayores ventajas y más facilidad para ser configuradas y activadas por cualquier persona que no sea experta en el tema.
Aprenderás a instalar tus propios mineros, así como también gestionarás y crearás tu criptocartera, para enviar y recibir Bitcoin, entenderás lo que es revisar en tiempo real tus ganancias y a conectarás tus cuentas de minería con tu smartphone para tener una mayor facilidad de monitoreo remoto.
El objetivo principal de este curso, es lograr minar tus propios Bitcoins siguiendo una serie de pasos que llevados a cabo correctamente te darán la entrada a una excelente oportunidad de inversión y creación de activos que trabajarán para ti. El curso ha sido diseñado para ser tomado sin necesidad alguna de tener conocimiento sobre el tema, es una guía específica que te permitirá introducirte al mundo de las criptomonedas y participar en esta revolución tecnológica que representa la tecnología de Blockchain.
target_audience: Principiantes en el tema de la mineria de Bitcoin sin conocimientos previos o con un breve conocimiento sobre la minería de Bitcoins
Entusiastas de las criptomonedas que estén interesados en el proceso de mineria de Bitcoin
Interesados en generar ingresos pasivos
Emprendedores

courses.title: Oszilloskop-Einsteiger-Bootcamp für Arduino-Entwickler
courses.bio: Vertiefe dein Verständnis für Oszilloskop- und Mikrocontroller-Inhalte mit diesem praxisnahen Einsteigerkurs
objectives: Oszilloskop richtig einrichten und für präzise Messungen nutzen.
Analoge und digitale Signale analysieren: Amplitude, Frequenz und Phase verstehen.
Einsatz von Funktionsgeneratoren zur Signalgenerierung und Visualisierung.
Untersuchung von Transistoren und Operationsverstärkern.
Messung und Verständnis von Signalcharakteristiken.
Praktische Anwendungen in der Elektronikentwicklung.
Grundlagen für Arduino-Projekte und andere Elektronikanwendungen.

Einleitung: Welche Software- und Hardware benötige ich
Download für Code - Materialliste und Begleitmaterialien
Oszilloskop Überblick: Warum sind Oszilloskope wichtig für Elektronik- und Arduino-Entwickler
Kann ich den Kurs trotz anderem Oszi-Hersteller mitmachen?
Oszilloskop im Überblick, Stecker, Tastkopf und Einstellungsbereiche
Bandbreite, Abtastrate und Speichertiefe und weitere Begrifflichkeiten
Erster Start mit dem Oszilloskop: ACHTUNG - vor der ersten Messung Masse/Ground checken
Erster Test von Zeitbasis und Spannungsbereich mit Offset und Trigger
Grundlagen der Signalanalyse & Funktions: Analog vs. Digitales Signal und Logic Analyzer
Charakteristika von Signalen: Amplitude, Frequenz und Phase
Exkurs ESP32 Signalgenerator: Mit Buttonsteuerung zum Wechseln der Signale
Verwendung der Trigger-Funktion: Trigger Typ wie Pulse und Slope
GPIO Latenzzeit: GPIO Arduino vs Direkt Register Ansteuerung
Exkurs Latenzzeit mit ATtiny Event System
CPU Takt und Rechenleistung: Laborschaltung und Messerergebnisse für mit ESP32
Rotary Encoder: Prellen und CLK und DT visualisieren

requirements: Arduino/ESP32 Grundkenntnisse
Grundlegendes Verständnis von Elektronik ist hilfreich, aber nicht notwendig.
Zugang zu einem Oszilloskop (vorzugsweise digital) wird empfohlen.
Interesse an Arduino und elektronischen Schaltungen
courses.description:
Tauche ein in die spannende Welt der Elektronik mit meinem „Oszilloskop-Einsteiger-Bootcamp für Arduino-Entwickler“! Dieser Kurs ist dein ultimativer Leitfaden, um die Theorie und Praxis der Signalanalyse zu entschlüsseln und deine Arduino-Projekte auf das nächste Level zu heben.
Dieser Kurs richtet sich an Anfänger im Umgang mit Oszilloskopen, die ein wenig Erfahrung mit Arduino mitbringen.
Von den Grundlagen bis zu fortgeschrittenen Techniken – ich begleite dich durch jeden Schritt. Lerne, wie du dein Oszilloskop optimal einsetzt, die richtigen Einstellungen findest und präzise Messungen durchführst. Erlebe, wie spannend es ist, analoge und digitale Signale zu analysieren, und entdecke die Möglichkeiten, die dir Funktionsgeneratoren und Logic Analyzer bieten.
Besondere Highlights des Kurses sind die praktischen Exkurse, in denen du unter anderem mit dem ESP32-Signalgenerator experimentierst, PWM-Signale visualisierst und die Latenzzeit von GPIOs untersuchst.
Doch das ist noch nicht alles: Ich zeige dir, wie du Kommunikationsprotokolle wie UART und I2C dekodierst, die Ladekurve von Kondensatoren misst und die Verstärkung von Operationsverstärkern berechnest. Mit spannenden Experimenten zu Transistor-Arbeitspunkten und Zener-Dioden schließen wir den Kurs ab.
Ob Anfänger oder erfahrener Entwickler – dieser Kurs bietet dir wertvolle Kenntnisse und praktische Erfahrungen, um deine Elektronikprojekte erfolgreich umzusetzen. Melde dich jetzt an und werde zum Oszilloskop-Profi!

Bis gleich im Kurs
Markus Edenhauser, MA MSc aka pixelEDI
target_audience: Hobbyisten mit Interesse an Elektronik und Arduino-Entwicklung.
Technikbegeisterte, die Oszilloskope und deren Anwendung kennenlernen möchten.
Anfänger in der Elektronik, die ihre Fähigkeiten erweitern möchten.
DIY-Enthusiasten, die ihre Projekte mit präzisen Messungen optimieren wollen.
Studenten der Elektrotechnik oder verwandter Studiengänge.
Alle, die Freude an praktischer Experimentation und technologischem Verständnis haben

courses.title: Técnico Manutenção de Impressoras e Multifuncionais Laser
courses.bio: Aprenda o funcionamento de uma impressora laser, uso de manuais de serviços, dicas de defeitos e muito mais
objectives: Como é o funcionamento de uma impressora laser e quais seus pontos fracos.

Teorias Aplicadas: Habilidades de Relacionamento com os Clientes
Aulas Bônus: Troca da palícula do fusor da HP P2035/2055 e M400/M425
Aula 9: Reset da mensagem "substituir cilindro de rec" Samsung
Aula 10: Instalação de Scanner Lexmark X656
Aula 11: Reparo no ADF (Alimentador automático de originais) Samsung 5637 e 4070

requirements: Não
courses.description:
Nesse curso iremos aprender o funcionamento de uma impressora laser, desde o zero. Iremos abordar também outras qualidades que um técnico precisa ter, como saber atender um cliente, como interpretar um manual de serviços e muito mais.
Esse curso foi idealizado em meados de 2006, e foi gravado e transformado em vídeo aula em 2017. Procuramos criar uma teoria bacana, com analogias à serem entendidas mesmo pra quem não é formado em eletrônica, pois entendo que somente sabendo perfeitamente o funcionamento de um equipamento, você será capaz de resolver seus problemas.
Eu espero que aproveitem bem, e desde já começamos alimentar o curso com aulas bônus. Colocarei esporadicamente aulas bônus de manutenção de impressoras, e também de instalação e configuração de softwares. Temos outros Tutoriais de impressoras e informática em.
Sucesso à todos
Carlos Talarico
target_audience: Pessoas com aptidões em mecânica e elétrica/eletrônica que queriam aprender um novo ofício ou se aperfeiçoar

courses.title: Starting with IoT Simulations
courses.bio: Using Wokwi for circuit development
requirements: Basic programming skills
Basic knowledge about electronic circuits
courses.description:
Welcome to "Starting with IoT Simulations," a comprehensive and free course designed to help you kickstart your journey into the exciting world of Internet of Things (IoT) using Wokwi, a powerful online simulation platform.


Course Overview:


Are you curious about IoT but don't have access to physical components or the budget to buy them? This course is perfect for you! We'll guide you through the process of creating and simulating IoT projects from scratch, all without the need for any physical hardware.


What You Will Learn:


Introduction to Wokwi: Understand what Wokwi is and how it can help your IoT project development.
Setting Up Your First Project: Learn how to create, configure, and simulate your first IoT project using Wokwi.
Simulating Sensors and Actuators: Discover how to add and configure various sensors and actuators, and write code to interact with them.


Wrap-up and Next Steps: Review key takeaways from the course and learn about the next steps to continue your IoT journey.


Who This Course is For:


Beginners interested in IoT and electronics
Students and hobbyists looking to experiment with IoT projects
Developers seeking to prototype and test IoT ideas quickly and cost-effectively
Educators wanting to introduce IoT concepts to their students


Requirements:


A computer with internet access
Basic understanding of programming concepts (helpful but not required)
target_audience: Electronics students
Hobbyists
Beginner backend developers who wants to learn about IoT and Eletronics
